moduleDescription: This module focuses on the development of foundation knowledge and skills for provision of nursing care to patients in a variety of health care settings. The focus will be on the role of the nurse, requirements for creating a safe patient-care environment, skills of clinical decision making, nursing health assessment, and nursing care practices to meet the activities of daily living for patients.
corequisite: NUR1110 Effective Communication for Health Professionals, NUR1113 Health and Well-being for Older Adults, NUR1107A Nursing Practice Experience 1.1
faculty: YONG LOO LIN SCHOOL OF MEDICINE
department: NURSING/ALICE LEE CTR FOR NURSING STUD
